transcript:
Executive: Accha, farak padta hai.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Kya, Abhinav sir, very good evening. Himanshu this side. Kaise hain aap?
Executive: Pehle bhi baat hui thi aapse.
Customer: Yes sir, boliye.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji. To aaj sir, Swapnil ji se aur Sneha se discussion hui aapki renewal ke regarding. Pricing ko lekar kuch discussion ho rahi thi. 50,000 plus GST aap teen saal ka demand kar rahe the, right sir? Ji.
Executive: To I just asking Abhinav sahab ki last jo aap agar aap invoice bhi check karoge apna, to humne around 90,000 ke around diya tha teen saal ka sir. Right? 84,960 matlab 85,000 ke around exact agar bole to. To sir ji abhi 50,000 aap expect kar rahe ho to kafi jyada difference hai na sir. Aur teen saal mein aapko thoda bahut to hike karna hi hota. To final jaise hamara 1 lakh plus GST ka hai aur humne 84,000 plus GST diya hai abhi. Theek hai? To isko 50 mein to nahi but ha aapka jo hai possibility jo final ho payega wo 78,660 aapka ho jayega. 78,660 for three years.

Executive: To baki logo se sir aap 84 se niche nahi le rahe hain kyuki but aapko humne around 67,000 kam kiya hai. Plus aapko ek cheez do cheez aur benefit de raha hu.
Customer: Ji, actually main ye bol raha hu ki management ki taraf se itna approval nahi hai.
Customer: Hai na? To agar aap negotiate kar dete to I will talk to them.
Executive: Sir to aap to sab kuch last bar ka dekh ke to hum kuch negotiate karenge na. Jo last humne print kiya tha. Ab aap
Customer: Kya kare?
Customer: Sir, negotiation point is not a negotiation point but at least I am just increasing almost almost 10,000 rupees.
Executive: 10%?
Customer: 60,000 agar kar dete hain to main kuch baat kar sakta hu fir management se.
Executive: Sir possibility to ek cheez karta huunga aap jaise ha boliye.
Customer: You have to close this in 50,000 but theek hai.
Customer: If you are if you are go with 60,000 then we will talk and process.
Executive: Sir ek cheez main wo sir possibility nahi sir hike to hua na thoda bahut main aapko do mahine extra bhi de raha hu isme. Instead of 36 month it will be 38 month sir.
Customer: That but management is not accepting this.
Executive: Sir but why sir because if you compare with the last year also, we are not even matching the last year costing sir. That we have done in 2022.
Customer: Because you know you know all three years we don't have that much there is much quality of leads.
Executive: Okay. So if if there will be less buyleads, right? If you get the less buyleads, so you don't actually I am saying checking that you haven't consume as much buyleads sir. So can you give you the services which which are having the less buyleads?
Customer: I will figure out that one but just now we are talking about the renewal. If you are doing talk to management otherwise leave it.
Executive: I I will ask the everything. So if we will give you the lesser buyleads package sir means instead of buyleads number will be reduced. So can we are okay with it?
Customer: I will figure out that in a minute.
Executive: Wait yeah. Sir I am online if we take that you will get the three year service in 66,500 plus GST will be the for the three years 36 months.
Customer: No no no I I am I am just required whatever you mention in the quotation.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: I am talking about this only about that package trusted trusted means okay. So so if there is a TrustSeal is a final then that will be the 78,660 plus GST and plus there will be two month extra as well. Means instead of 36 month it will be 38 instead of November it will be the January 2029.
Executive: That you will get the additional benefit from our side.
Customer: That is not the issue. If you will go with 60,000 then we will talk otherwise leave it.
Executive: Sir that is how it will be possible sir that for the 60.
Customer: Leave it not an issue leave it.
Executive: So I will give you the final quotation if with the TrustSeal and without TrustSeal we can give you the 66,500 for 36 months sir.
Customer: I require only TrustSeal.
Executive: So that TrustSeal will be 78,660 sir. Sir you just compare with the everything is upgraded the you have upgrade means you will get that of your employee everything every costing is revised sir for three years. So there will be 5% 10% hike. You just there is reducing the price from the last year price. So it's not possible sir if there is any issue in the lead we are providing the two months extra also sir.
Customer: Sir if it is not possible then why are you on that? Why are you discussing?
Executive: Management is there if management is not accepted.
Executive: Because we have one of the vintage customer and we have in discussion for a longer period of time that's why that's it sir. That's why we are requesting we talk to management I can we can give the final I will tell you know that the mail 78,664 three years 38 months.
Executive: Please check that sir. if you go for without TrustSeal then it will be sir final that is 66,500 plus GST.
Customer: Not accepted sir.
Executive: So sir how we can manage sir how can we expecting that we will reduce the price as compared to the last previously three years. That won't be possible sir.
Executive: That won't be possible sir.
Executive: How are expecting sir?

Customer: Leave it it's not possible leave it. Don't worry. Call pe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants renewal at INR 50,000 plus GST.

- Management not approving current renewal price.

- Wants to close the deal at INR 60,000.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered INR 78,660 with TrustSeal.

- Offered 2 months extra validity.

- Offered INR 66,500 without TrustSeal.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, pricing, trustseal, buyleads
